checkers.flow

Interface Flow

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFlow, DefaultFlow, RegexFlow

    public interface Flow
    Interface for a generalized flow-sensitive qualifier inference for the checkers framework.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scan(Tree tree)
      Scan the given (root) tree and infer the refined types.
      void setDebug(PrintStream debug)
      Sets the PrintStream for printing debug messages, such as System.out or System.err, or null if no debugging output should be emitted (the default).
      Set<AnnotationMirror> test(Tree tree)
      Determines the inference result for a tree.

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        void scan(Tree tree)
        Scan the given (root) tree and infer the refined types.
        Parameters:
        tree - The tree to scan

      • test

        Set<AnnotationMirror> test(Tree tree)
        Determines the inference result for a tree.
        Parameters:
        tree - The tree to test
        Returns:
        The set of annotations inferred for a tree, or null if no annotation was inferred for that tree

      • setDebug

        void setDebug(PrintStream debug)
        Sets the PrintStream for printing debug messages, such as System.out or System.err, or null if no debugging output should be emitted (the default).
